meanings.definition: A person who emphasizes precise accuracy in their work.
meanings.sent1: The precisionist carefully measured each ingredient for the recipe.
meanings.sent2: The precisionist's attention to detail ensured the project was flawless.
meanings.sent3: The precisionist double-checked the measurements, afraid of a baking disaster.
meanings.sent4: She was a precisionist in her craft, sculpting each detail with meticulous care.
meanings.sent5: The precisionist's dedication to accuracy set a high standard for the team.

meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of precisionists.
meanings.sent1: The artist's precisionist style was evident in the intricate patterns of the painting.
meanings.sent2: Her precisionist approach to design resulted in sleek and modern products.
meanings.sent3: The precisionist choice of colors created a harmonious and balanced composition.
meanings.sent4: His precisionist attention to symmetry made the building stand out in the cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The precisionist lines of the sculpture conveyed a sense of order and control.
